hl.seg: Avoid dieting..Prevent flu.

doc.seg: American scientists found this to be true from experimenting on mice.
Results proved that mice on a lower calorie diet had comparatively less ability to fight the flu virus.
Research disproved the old axiom, "It is better to fast during a fever".
According to scientists, one should eat during a fever.

Researchers at The Michigan State University said that mice, who were fed a lower calorie diet had less ability to fight flu symptoms than their counterparts who were eating a normal diet. Studies also showed that their chances of death from the flu virus also increased. Mice eating a normal diet had the strength to fight off the virus and live a longer life.
Professor Elizabeth Gardner said that those who are dieting are not only sooner affected by the flu, but also take longer to recover.
She also said that those who have taken flu vaccines should avoid dieting for a few months during the winter.

Among the factors are the design of the bomb and information he gathered from Chinese scientists.
He further added that that was the reason that Pakistan was able to reply to India's Nuclear test with a nuclear test, in just 2 weeks and 3 days.
Thomas Reid reminded us that in 1961, Russia suddenly performed a nuclear test. In response, America took 17 days to preform a test, despite having this bomb for a long time.
He further said that atomic bomb test Pakistan conducted on May 28, 1998 was made with extreme care, and Pakistani scientists had complete confidence in it.
When Thomas Reeds was questioned about China providing nuclear technology to Pakistan he replied that India was a common enemy for Pakistan and China.
He said that there is a proof that Doctor Abdul Qadeer Khan used Chinese designs, and the documents which were acquired from Libya confirm this statement.
He further stated that doing combined nuclear tests is common, and that in 1990 the United States conducted a nuclear test for Britain on an open belt in the Nevada desert.
He said that he also assumed that Israel was given access to the results of this test.
Thomas Reed was also questioned whether the Chinese nuclear spread program is continuing?
On this, Thomas Reed said that China has been supplying raw material, instructions and design to a nuclear facility in Iran's city Isfahan since 1990.
Additionally, China provided Iran a nuclear enrichment plant.
He said that China has been providing nuclear technology to Iran, Syria, Pakistan, Egypt, Libya and Yemen thorough North Korea.

This virus creates its own file name.

This virus creates a problem after it gets active; it comes out as 'HTTP Server' and changes the restore point of the machine.
After that, it downloads files from the hacker's website.
Microsoft has reported that this virus has affected computers in different countries.
These countries include China, Brazil, Russia, India, America and Britain.

hl.seg: Economic Setback Leads to Suicide of German Billionaire

The Merkle group had to face the loss of a few hundred million euros due to the arrival of the financial crisis after it bought shares in the German car manufacturing company Volkswagen.

Some time before that, the same bank was prepared to give it the immediate loan that it needed, but Adolf Merkel had got to this position from being a small producer, to having a yearly turnover of nearly 30 billion euros, so he could not bear to lose his capitalistic power.
After the death of his father, Adolf Merkel took over his family business and developed it quickly, putting on new lines.
He called his company Ratiopharm, which is a very successful and large pharmaceutical company in Germany.

Until a while ago, the value of this business was between 5 billion and 6 billion euros, and it still earns about 8.1 billion euros a year. After the superb success of Ratiopharm, the Merkel Group started buying many other institutions which included construction supply manufacturing companies like Hydelburg Cement to car manufacturing companies like Kassbohrer.
The number of employees of the Merkel Group around the world is near 100,000, and its foundation company, the pharmaceutical company Ratiopharm, always had special importance.

After the death of Adolf Meerklay, the Meerklay group will not remain the same.

hl.seg: Tea: an effective cure for breast cancer

doc.seg: According to a new research, three cups of tea a day,
if taken, can decrease the risk of cancer in women below 50 years of age, by more than a third.

In a research carried out by the Moffitt Cancer Institute, in the American state of Florida, it was revealed that the risk of occurrence of breast cancer tumors, in such women below the age of 50 years
who drink at least three cups of tea a day, is reduced by up to 37%.
It was also revealed in the research that there was no significant benefit, in these regards, in the woman aged above 50, who drank three or more cups of tea a day.
Experts believe that the reason for this is that tea has such ingredients in it, which are more effective against specific tumors which generally occur in women below the age of 50.
Research was done on 5000 women who had Breast Cancer treatment at Moffitt Cancer Center in Tampa,Florida.
Their ages were between 20 and 74 years.
Specialists compared their medical records and lifestyles to those women who were free of breast cancer.
Specialists also found that tea had the most effect on one specific kind of breast cancer, Lobes. It reduced the risk by 66%.
One on every ten breast cancer patients has this kind of cancer.
This type of breast cancer is dangerous because it is deep inside and usually only diagnosed when it has become widespread.
Specialists found that having at least three cups of tea every day can readily reduce the chances of breast cancer in women of younger ages.
They found that incorporating tea as a regular drink in your daily routine helps create immunity against the cancer.
Almost 40,000 women are diagnosed with breast cancer in Britain.

hl.seg: Why reduce exercise with the age?
new research

experts say that exercise keeps our body and brain active, however, age can affect it.
According to the American Medical Association, several health related problems can arise by not doing exercise.
Dr. Patricia P. Leka of the Mayo Clinic in Minnesota says that an increase in age is a big reason for man's decrease in exercise and physical activity.
Dr. Patricia teaches medicine at the Mayo Clinic.
She headed research regarding heart disease and a man's ability to do exercise in older age.
A team of doctors used high frequency sound waves to observe the performance of the heart.
They studied how the heart contracts and relaxes as it pumps blood.
Researches focused their attention on the right side of the heart, which is responsible for pumping blood.
They came to know that as age increases, problems increase in the relaxation action of the heart.
Dr. Patricia says with an increase in age, problems occur in the relaxation of heart and this effects the ability to exercise.
Dr. Garvin Ken was part of this research.
He says that they were surprised to see that it has an effect, as it confirmed that poor exercising ability is closely related to the heart's relaxation phase.
Sometimes blood pressure can cause faults in the working of the heart and can become a cause of heart diseases.
If the doctor and the patient work together on the faults of the heart, they can achieve the benefits of excercise, despite the increase in age.
A detailed report of this has been published in the American Medical Association's magazine.
